title: Integration with CyberArk Idaptive Identity
description: This document describes the procedure to configure the BlockID Admin Console as a passwordless authentication solution for your organization's CyberArk Idaptive Identity portal. This integration will allow your users to log in to the CyberArk Idaptive Identity applicationâ€™s account leveraging their biometrics. The biometric options include TouchID / FaceID and LiveID.
